name: Nexgentek
overview:
Nexgentek provides unique contactless mobile technology for medium to large scaled retail outlets to increase footfall and better customer engagement without the need for hefty CAPEX costs on POS hardware or being reliant on NFC.

These solutions consist of:

  • Mobile Coupon: providing retailer’s with a unique end to end 360 degree solution to push out mobile coupons in real time directly into your Android/iOS application whilst the consumer has it redeemed from their smartphone via a pod attached to the POS whilst having access to any bespoke analytics required.

  • Mobile Loyalty: mobilising your existing or creating a new loyalty program to providing unique mobile coupons based on customers buying behaviour.

  • Mobile Check In & Heat Mapping: Promoting offers upon arrival into or throughout store along with mapping one’s movement to better engage with consumer to provide unique mobile offers.

  • Mobile Strategy & Development: Understanding your vision and market to then blueprint a plan of attack. Nexgentek can help aid in any development that is required.
